name: Prism Court
overview: In Prism Court the player controls a Coach of a female high school volleyball team and make the team to win the national tournament. The problem is that most of the team staff and the team players are just amateurs without so many experience. So the player have to prepare each week training, trying to make a specific work for each of his players to make them improve their stats. The better stats that all the team members got the easy that they can win matchs. Instead of preparing the trainings the players as a coach have to talk to each team member to make them feel better and motivated. So are you ready to make them win the tournament and maybe reach the national team?. The game also features a gallery mode that will be opened after finished the game. There are different endings and different galleries. In the gallery the player can see an album of memories that will be told by the team member.
